typeProperties.script:
source(output(

		RECALC_ACTION_CODE as boolean,

		CHECKER_ID as string,

		ARVN_APPLIED as boolean,
		ALT_ACC_NO as string,
		DR_PAYMENT_MODE as string,
		CR_PAYMENT_MODE as string,
		DR_PROD_AC as integer,
		CR_PROD_AC as integer,

		CR_ACC_BRN as short,

		CLG_BANK_CODE_CR as string,
		CLG_BRN_CODE_CR as string,
		PC_CAT_CR as string,
		EXT_ACC_NO_DR as string,
		EXT_ACC_NAME_DR as string,
		CLG_BANK_CODE_DR as string,
		CLG_BRN_CODE_DR as string,
		PC_CAT_DR as string,
		CARD_NO as string,
		INSTRUMENT_NO_CR as string,
		ROUTING_NO_CR as string,
		END_POINT_CR as string,
		CLG_PROD_CODE_CR as string,
		SECTOR_CODE_CR as string,
		INSTRUMENT_NO_DR as string,
		ROUTING_NO_DR as string,
		END_POINT_DR as string,
		CLG_PROD_CODE_DR as string,
		SECTOR_CODE_DR as string,
		UPLOAD_SOURCE_DR as string,
		UPLOAD_SOURCE_CR as string,
		EMI_AMOUNT as string,
		CUTOFF_TRANSACTION as boolean,
		DELINQUENCY_STATUS as string,
		INDEX_XRATE as string,
		PARTIAL_LIQUIDATION as boolean,
		ALIQ_REVERSED_PMT as boolean,
		NO_OF_INSTALLMENTS as short,
		FREQUENCY as string,

		FIRST_INS_DATE as string,
		LINKED_REFERENCE as string,
		LINKAGE_TYPE as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_1 as short,
		FIELD_CHAR_2 as boolean,
		FIELD_CHAR_3 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_4 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_5 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_6 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_7 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_8 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_9 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_10 as integer,
		FIELD_CHAR_11 as integer,
		FIELD_CHAR_12 as integer,
		FIELD_CHAR_13 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_14 as boolean,
		FIELD_CHAR_15 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_16 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_17 as long,
		FIELD_CHAR_18 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_19 as string,
		FIELD_CHAR_20 as string,
		FIELD_NUMBER_1 as short,
		FIELD_NUMBER_2 as short,
		FIELD_NUMBER_3 as short,
		FIELD_NUMBER_4 as integer,
		FIELD_NUMBER_5 as integer,
		FIELD_NUMBER_6 as short,
		FIELD_NUMBER_7 as boolean,
		FIELD_NUMBER_8 as integer,
		FIELD_NUMBER_9 as boolean,
		FIELD_NUMBER_10 as integer,
		FIELD_NUMBER_11 as short,
		FIELD_NUMBER_12 as string,
		FIELD_NUMBER_13 as boolean,
		FIELD_NUMBER_14 as double,
		FIELD_NUMBER_15 as double,
		FIELD_NUMBER_16 as string,
		FIELD_NUMBER_17 as string,
		FIELD_NUMBER_18 as string,
		FIELD_NUMBER_19 as string,
		FIELD_NUMBER_20 as string,
		FIELD_DATE_1 as string,
		FIELD_DATE_2 as string,
		FIELD_DATE_3 as string,
		FIELD_DATE_4 as string,
		FIELD_DATE_5 as string,
		FIELD_DATE_6 as string,
		FIELD_DATE_7 as string,
		FIELD_DATE_8 as string,
		FIELD_DATE_9 as string,
		FIELD_DATE_10 as string,
		ROLL_BY as string,
		MATURITY_TYPE as boolean,
		NET_PRINCIPAL as integer,
		EXECUTION_DATE as string,
		MIGRATION_DATE as string,
		USGT_STATUS as string,
		LAST_INTRADAY_ACCR_DT as string,
		GIRO_MODE_DR as string,
		GIRO_SERVICE_DR as string,
		GIRO_NUMBER_DR as string,
		PAYER_ACC_NO_DR as string,
		PAYER_BANK_CODE_DR as string,
		PAYER_BRANCH_DR as string,
		PAYER_ADDRESS1_DR as string,
		PAYER_ADDRESS2_DR as string,
		PAYER_ADDRESS3_DR as string,
		PAYER_ADDRESS4_DR as string,
		GIRO_MODE_CR as string,
		GIRO_SERVICE_CR as string,
		GIRO_NUMBER_CR as string,
		PAYER_ACC_NO_CR as string,
		PAYER_BANK_CODE_CR as string,
		PAYER_BRANCH_CR as string,
		PAYER_ADDRESS1_CR as string,
		PAYER_ADDRESS2_CR as string,
		PAYER_ADDRESS3_CR as string,
		PAYER_ADDRESS4_CR as string,
		DUE_DATES_ON as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MASTER
source(output(
		ACCOUNT_NUMBER as string,
		BRANCH_CODE as short,
		EVENT_SEQ_NO as short,
		VALUE_DATE as string,
		EXECUTION_DATE as string,
		PAYMENT_STATUS as string,
		AUTH_STAT as string,
		MAKER_ID as string,
		MAKER_DT_STAMP as string,
		CHECKER_ID as string,
		CHECKER_DT_STAMP as string,
		REV_MAKER_ID as string,
		REV_MAKER_DT_STAMP as string,
		REV_CHECKER_ID as string,
		REV_CHECKER_DT_STAMP as string,
		REVP_ESN as string,
		MLIQ_ESN as short,
		PROCESS_NO as boolean,
		PREPMNT_RECOMP_BASIS as string,
		PREPMNT_RECOMP_FROM as string,
		INSTALLMENT_PAYMENT as boolean,
		LIMIT_DATE as string,
		SIMULATED as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LIQ
MASTER select(mapColumn(
		CREDITO = ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
		MONTO_INICIAL = AMOUNT_FINANCED,
		BRANCH_CODE,
		ID_CLIENTE = CUSTOMER_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Columnas
LIQ select(mapColumn(
		ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
		BRANCH_CODE,
		EXECUTION_DATE,
		PAYMENT_STATUS,
		CHECKER_DT_STAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ColumnasLIQ
PAYMENTSTATUSP derive(EXECUTION_DATE = toTimestamp(EXECUTION_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'),
		CHECKER_DT_STAMP = toTimestamp(CHECKER_DT_STAMP,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')) ~> Alteraciondecolumnas
Columnas, Alteraciondecolumnas join(CREDITO == ACCOUNT_NUMBER
	&& Columnas@BRANCH_CODE == ColumnasLIQ@BRANCH_CODE,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(CREDITO,
		MONTO_INICIAL,
		ID_CLIENTE),
	CHECKER_DT_STAMP = iifNull(max(CHECKER_DT_STAMP),toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'),max(CHECKER_DT_STAMP))) ~> Aggregate1
ColumnasLIQ filter(PAYMENT_STATUS=='P') ~> PAYMENTSTATUSP
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
